section.title: XDI Connections
section.para: Using XDI link contracts (see ), this specification defines how to establish connections between peers.
A connection between peers is represented by a link contract between an authorizing authority and a requesting authority.
Connections can be established in two ways:

listitem.para: A link contract is written into the authorizing authority's graph using the standard XDI messaging operations $set or $add. This method does
A link contract can be created using a connection message, which initiates a process called link contract instantiation. In this process, a link contract template is used to create a link contract.
